alternativeNames: Liu, Tung Shui; Liu, T'ang Jui; Liu, Tang Rui
examples: Cerastium taiwanense T.S. Liu in Quart. J. Taiwan Mus., 4(2): 211 (1951). Abies sect. Vejarianae T.S. Liu in Quart. J. Taiwan Mus., 28(1-2): 230 (1975).
source: It looks as though Liu, Tung Shui is a printer's error in the Meikle list. Index  Herb. Sin.: 382 (1993) gives an alternative spelling Liu, Tang Rui (see also page 330 and entries for Liu, Tang Shui in Bibliography of Chinese Systematic Botany, 1993).
